name: Bagoblins
description:
It's your first day on the job as 'potion inventory sorter', exciting! Try to keep up as more potions come in, and fulfill orders at the same time. The bowler hat frog can be very demanding.

Dev Team:

  • Alexis Adolpho (sfx + music)
  • Jacob Dickerman (lead programmer)
  • Grace Ho (artist + supplementary code)

For CMPM/ARTG 120 Spring 22.
